name: Mirror Drop
description: An overwhelmingly psychedelic puzzle game full of mirrors, over-saturated colors, and infinities.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 100 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 100 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 Storage: 30 MB available space
